definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: This will initiate a neurological chain reaction that will help move us in the right direction.
sentences.chinese: 这将引发一些列能将我们引导到正确方向的连锁反应。

sentences.english: I think it's easy to get sucked into one of the chains.
sentences.chinese: 我想很容易就牵扯上其中的一家连锁店了。

sentences.english: To ensure maximum sales for in-house facilities and cross sell other Regent destinations by continuously promoting them upon inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 确保最大限度地促销本酒店以及连锁酒店的产品。

sentences.english: Cushman is director of marketing for a chain of Italian restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 库什曼是一家连锁意大利饭馆的市场部总裁。

sentences.english: It is the polymerization of units linked end-to-end that forms the characteristic chains of macromolecules.
sentences.chinese: 这些单位的首尾聚合，形成大分子的特有连锁。

sentences.english: In the paper, a multi-stage sequential-move game model is set up.
sentences.chinese: 论文建立了连锁故障预防的多阶段序贯博弈模型。

sentences.english: As pharmacy chains face squeezes on profit margins, the use of techs is growing.
sentences.chinese: 配药连锁店由于利润幅度紧缩，使用的技工越来越多。

sentences.english: She had eaten a hamburger at a California fast-food chain.
sentences.chinese: 她在加利福尼亚的快餐连锁店吃了一个汉堡。

sentences.english: We had a chain reaction of them here, she adds.
sentences.chinese: 她补充说，当时，韩国出现了一系列的连锁反应。

sentences.english: Power interlock protective system ensures safe operation.
sentences.chinese: 电源连锁环保系统，保障操作安全。

sentences.english: The technology lifting and administrative promotion are chain supermarkets job competition core.
sentences.chinese: 技术的提升和管理的升级是连锁超市业的竞争核心。

sentences.english: Don't send chain letters virus warnings or junk mail.
sentences.chinese: 不要发送连锁信，病毒警告信或垃圾邮件。

sentences.english: Note: Systembolaget is a government owned chain of liquor stores in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 这是政府拥有的酒类连锁店。

sentences.english: Moreover, public spending seems to have odd knock-off effects.
sentences.chinese: 此外，公共支出似乎具有怪异的连锁效应。

sentences.english: On this foundation, the article carried on a comparison about the relevant circumstance of Chinese and Foreign retail trade catena supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 文章对中外零售业连锁超市的有关情况入行了比较。

sentences.english: In today's society, supermarket chains industry competition has become increasingly fierce.
sentences.chinese: 当今社会，连锁超市业的竞争日益激烈。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
